This pack has a reputation for totally crazy and hacked parts that are simply config edits and bad retextures, but its awesome if you like crazy parts.

Download:

[removed]

Also, could someone be my partner because I don\'t know how to model?

Or at least could someone guide me to a good software and/or tutorial

Thanks! ;D

P.S. could any one who downloads and tries it tell me what they think of it? It would be really helpfull, and tell me if the adfly is annoying/ not working
